markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 6" pfs="Standard">[Ancestral Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=743)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=320" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 230 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Mystery**
[Ancestors](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=1)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You take the form of your ancestral spirits, becoming invisible and quasi-corporeal. You gain resistance 10 to all damage (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=75) and damage from Strikes with the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune), and this resistance is doubled against non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) and precision damage. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed; when Flying, moving upward isn't difficult terrain for you. You can't move through solid objects, but you can float through tiny gaps. You can't Cast Spells (but you can Sustain Spells), activate items, or use actions that have the [attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15) or [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) trait.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The resistance increases by 5.
name: Ancestral Form

</summary>

text: Ancestral Form Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 230 2.0 Mystery Ancestors Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You take the form of your ancestral spirits, becoming invisible and quasi-corporeal. You gain resistance 10 to all damage (except force and damage from Strikes with the ghost touch property rune), and this resistance is doubled against non-magical and precision damage. You gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed; when Flying, moving upward isn't difficult terrain for you. You can't move through solid objects, but you can float through tiny gaps. You can't Cast Spells (but you can Sustain Spells), activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. --- Heightened (+2) The resistance increases by 5.
